lines: Me yaw mu ɔde 'yamye bɛboa me,
Daa ɔdo na ɔhwɛ Ne nk'rɔfo.
Mɛkā aky'rɛ Yesu, Mɛkā aky'rɛ Yesu,
Mɛkā aky'rɛ Yesu, Mɛkā aky'rɛ Yesu,
Yesu tum' boa me, Yesu nkutoo.
'Sɛ sɛ meka me haw ny'naa ky'rɛ Yesu,
Sɛ mesrɛ No a, ɔbɛgye me nkwa,
Na Wama me haw atwam' akɔ.
Wiase daadaa me, twe me kɔ bɔnem',
Ao, me koma taa hwč ase bɔnem';
Mɛkā aky'rɛ Yesu, na ɔbɛboa me
